A funk cover of Beyoncé's "Halo" by Scary Pockets, Swatkins & Frankfurt Radio Big Band

MUSICIAN CREDITS
Talkbox: Swatkins
Drums: Efa Etoroma Jr.
Bass: Nick Campbell
Keys: Jack Conte
Guitar: Ryan Lerman

FRANKFURT RADIO BIG BAND CREDITS
Saxophones: Heinz-Dieter Sauerborn, Oliver Leicht, Steffen Weber, Denis Gaebel, Rainer Heute
Trumpets: Frank Wellert, Thomas Vogel, Martin Auer, Axel Schlosser
Trombones: Günter Bollmann, Felix Fromm, Jonathan Boebel, Robert Hedemann

AUDIO CREDITS
Scary Pockets Recording Engineer: Caleb Parker
Big Band Recording Engineers: Axel Gutzler, Alexander Kolb
Mix/Master: Caleb Parker
Big Band Arrangement: Jacob Mann
Big Band Conductor: Jochen Welsch

VIDEO CREDITS
Scary Pockets DP: Merlin Showalter
Big Band Director: Jonas Jung
Big Band Camera Operator: Jonas Weinholdd
Editor: Adam Kritzberg
Big Band Management: Olaf Stötzler

Recorded Live at Scary Pockets HQ in Los Angeles, CA & Hörfunkstudio 2, Hessischer Rundfunk, Frankfurt, Germany.
